title: Arturo de la Cruz Libardi
text:
Arturo de la Cruz Libardi






Work and study in the EHM Lab at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine.
Focus: modelling airborne pollutants for exposure assessment and epidemiological research.






For more, this is my institutional profile.
My ORCID with publications and collaborations.
And my personal and EHM-Lab GitHub, where the code lives.

R, Neuroscience, Hiking, Sci-fi, Meadows, Interesting Words, Orcas, Volleyball, Mountains, â€¦
